ADDPOP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ADDPOP &FLDNAM,&ROW,&COLUMN
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: ADDPOP   START POPUP WINDOW MODE
.*
.* (OPTIONAL)  FLDNAM   - POSITION POPUP WINDOW RELATIVE TO FLDNAM
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROW      - ADJUST FLD SPECIFIC ROW BY SPECIFIED AMOUNT
.* (OPTIONAL)  COLUMN   - ADJUST FLD SPECIFIC COL BY SPECIFIED AMOUNT
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &ADDV
         LCLC  &FLDV
         LCLC  &ROWV
         LCLC  &COLV
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &ADDPPRM
&BRANCH  SETC  'ADP'.'&SYSNDX'
&ADDPPRM SETC  'ADDP'.'&SYSNDX'
&ADDV    SETC  'A(ADDPOP)'
&FLDV    SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWV    SETC  'A(0)'
&COLV    SETC  'A(0)'
         AIF   ('&FLDNAM' EQ '').ROWL
&FLDV    SETC  'A(&FLDNAM)'
.ROWL    AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').COLL
&ROWV    SETC  'A(&ROW)'
.COLL    AIF   ('&COLUMN' EQ '').DONE
&COLV    SETC  'A(&COLUMN)'
.DONE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         AIF   ('&COLUMN' EQ '').ROW
&COLV    SETC  'A(&COLUMN+X''80000000'')'
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROW     AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').FLD
&ROWV    SETC  'A(&ROW+X''80000000'')'
         AGO   .FINIS
.FLD     AIF   ('&FLDNAM' EQ '').ADDPOP
&FLDV    SETC  'A(&FLDNAM+X''80000000'')'
         AGO   .FINIS
.ADDPOP  ANOP
&ADDV    SETC  'A(ADDPOP+X''80000000'')'
.FINIS   ANOP
         CNOP  0,4
&ADDPPRM DC    &ADDV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    &COLV
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&ADDPPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
         MEND

BROWS.text:
MACRO
&NAME    BROWS   &DSN=,&VOLSER=,&DATAID=,&MBR=
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: BROWSE      BROWSE A DATASET
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  DSN= OR DATAID=
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &BROPRM
         LCLC  &VOLLBL
         LCLC  &MEMLBL
&BRANCH  SETC  'BRO'.'&SYSNDX'
&BROPRM  SETC  'BROP'.'&SYSNDX'
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         B     &BRANCH
&BROPRM  DC    A(BROWSE)
         AIF   ('&VOLSER' EQ '').MBR
&VOLLBL  SETC  'VOL'.'&SYSNDX'
&VOLLBL  DC    CL6'&VOLSER'
.MBR     AIF   ('&MBR' EQ '').DSN
&MEMLBL  SETC  'MEM'.'&SYSNDX'
&MEMLBL  DC    CL8'&MBR'
.DSN     AIF   ('&DSN' NE '').DATASET
         AIF   ('&DATAID' NE '').DATAID
         AGO   .ERRPRM1
.DATASET ANOP
         AIF   ('&DATAID' NE '').ERRPRM2
         AIF   ('&VOLLBL' NE '').CALL2
         DC    A(&DSN+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CALL2   DC    A(&DSN)
         DC    A(&VOLLBL+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.DATAID  ANOP
         AIF   ('&MEMLBL' NE '').CALL3
         DC    A(&DATAID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CALL3   DC    A(&DATAID)
         DC    A(&MEMLBL+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&BROPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERRPRM1 MNOTE 12,'DSN OR DATAID IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERRPRM2 MNOTE 12,'BOTH DSN AND DATAID CANNOT BE SPECIFIED'
         MEXIT
         MEND

BROWSE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    BROWSE  &DSN=,&VOLSER=,&DATAID=,&MBR=
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: BROWSE      BROWSE A DATASET
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  DSN= OR DATAID=
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &BROPRM
         LCLC  &VOLLBL
         LCLC  &MEMLBL
&BRANCH  SETC  'BRO'.'&SYSNDX'
&BROPRM  SETC  'BROP'.'&SYSNDX'
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         B     &BRANCH
&BROPRM  DC    A(BROWSE)
         AIF   ('&VOLSER' EQ '').MBR
&VOLLBL  SETC  'VOL'.'&SYSNDX'
&VOLLBL  DC    CL6'&VOLSER'
.MBR     AIF   ('&MBR' EQ '').DSN
&MEMLBL  SETC  'MEM'.'&SYSNDX'
&MEMLBL  DC    CL8'&MBR'
.DSN     AIF   ('&DSN' NE '').DATASET
         AIF   ('&DATAID' NE '').DATAID
         AGO   .ERRPRM1
.DATASET ANOP
         AIF   ('&DATAID' NE '').ERRPRM2
         AIF   ('&VOLLBL' NE '').CALL2
         DC    A(&DSN+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CALL2   DC    A(&DSN)
         DC    A(&VOLLBL+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.DATAID  ANOP
         AIF   ('&MEMLBL' NE '').CALL3
         DC    A(&DATAID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CALL3   DC    A(&DATAID)
         DC    A(&MEMLBL+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&BROPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERRPRM1 MNOTE 12,'DSN OR DATAID IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERRPRM2 MNOTE 12,'BOTH DSN AND DATAID CANNOT BE SPECIFIED'
         MEXIT
         MEND

CBFMT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    CBFMT  &FLD=,&LEN=,&TYPE=,&OFFSET=,&DESC=
         LCLA  &XSET                   OFFSET IN FIELD
         LCLA  &XLEN                   OFFSET IN FIELD
         LCLA  &TLEN                   OFFSET IN FIELD
         LCLA  &SLEN                   OFFSET IN FIELD
         LCLA  &BOFFSET                OFFSET IN FIELD
&TLEN    SETA  &LEN*2+1                TARGET LEN FOR UNPACK
&BOFFSET SETA  &LEN*2+20               OFFSET FOR EXTRA BLANK
&SLEN    SETA  &LEN+1                  SOURCE LEN FOR UNPACK
&XLEN    SETA  K'&OFFSET               LENGTH OF OFFSET ARG
&DESCLEN SETA  K'&DESC-2               LENGTH OF DESC FLD - 2 FOR ''
         AIF   ('&LEN' GT '8').ERRLEN
         AIF   ('&FLD' EQ '').ERRMISS
         AIF   (K'&DESC  GT 95).ERRDESC
         AIF   (K'&OFFSET EQ 4).LEN4
         AIF   (K'&OFFSET EQ 3).LEN3
         AIF   (K'&OFFSET EQ 2).LEN2
&XSET    SETA  4
         AGO   .CODE
.LEN2    ANOP
&XSET    SETA  3
         AGO   .CODE
.LEN3    ANOP
&XSET    SETA  2
         AGO   .CODE
.LEN4    ANOP
&XSET    SETA  1
.*
.CODE    ANOP
         MVI   0(2),C' '             CLEAR PRINT LINE
         MVC   1(132,2),0(2)
         MVC   &XSET.(&XLEN,2),=C'&OFFSET'    OFFSET
         MVC   7(1,2),=C'&LEN'                LENGTH
         MVC   10(8,2),=CL8'&FLD'             FLD NAME
         MVC   37(&DESCLEN,2),=C&DESC         DESCRIPTION
         AIF   ('&TYPE' EQ 'CHARACTER').CHAR
         AIF   ('&LEN' EQ '8').TWOPRT
         UNPK  20(&TLEN,2),&FLD.(&SLEN)
         TR    20(&TLEN,2),HEXTAB-240         VALUE
         MVI   &BOFFSET.(2),C' '
         AGO   .NEXT
.TWOPRT  UNPK  20(9,2),&FLD.(5)
         TR    20(9,2),HEXTAB-240
         UNPK  28(9,2),&FLD.+4(5)
         TR    28(9,2),HEXTAB-240
         MVI   36(2),C' '
         AGO   .NEXT
.CHAR    MVC   20(&LEN,2),&FLD       EBCDIC SO NO CONVERSION
.NEXT    LA    2,133(,2)             INCREMENT TO NEXT SLOT IN TABLE
         LA    3,1(,3)               ADD 1 TO LINE CNTR
         MEXIT
.ERRLEN  MNOTE 12,'LEN CANNOT BE GREATER THAN 8'
         MEXIT
.ERRMISS MNOTE 12,'FLD NAME IS MISSING'
         MEXIT
.ERRDESC MNOTE 12,'DESCRIPTION IS TOO LONG. MAX 95'
         MEXIT
         MEND

CFCOM01.text:
MCBOFFSET EQU  120                      offset to MCB in trace rec
MRBOFFSET EQU  256                      offset from MCB to MRB in rec
         ST    R13,SAVE+4
         LA    R14,SAVE
         ST    R14,8(R13)
         LR    R13,R14
*---------------------------------------------------------------------
* Get parms from parmlist in register 1
*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         ST    R1,SAVER1
         L     R2,0(,R1)                address of ptr to record
         L     R2,0(,R2)                address of record
         L     R3,4(,R1)                address of CMD to pass back
         L     R3,12(,R1)               address of ptr to ISPLINK addr
         L     R3,0(,R3)                address of ISPLINK
         ST    R3,SAVEISP               save for use by ISPF macros
*
*---------------------------------------------------------------------
* LOAD A COPY OF ISPLINK FOR USE BY THE DIALOG MANAGER MACROS
*---------------------------------------------------------------------
*      Common variables
         B     DEFCOMMON
SAVEISP  DS    F
DEFCOMMON EQU  *
         VDEFINE (RESP,MRBRC),FIXED,1
         VDEFINE (GTFTIM),CHAR,16
         VDEFINE (MCBHDR,MRBHDR),HEX,16
         VDEFINE (CMDCD,SID,SBCH),HEX,2
         VDEFINE (SMSGTM,RCNT),FIXED,4
         VDEFINE (JOBNAME),CHAR,8
         VDEFINE (RESPDESC),CHAR,40
         CLI   VARS_DEFND,C'Y'          are the ISPF variables defined
         BE    FILLVARS

CFCOM02.text:
MVI   VARS_DEFND,C'Y'
FILLVARS EQU   *
         L     R5,32(,R2)               last 4 bytes of STCK
         L     R6,40(,R2)               ditto
         SR    R6,R5                    SMSG time
         SRL   R6,12                    shift down to microsecs
         ST    R6,SMSGTM                move to panel field
         MVC   GTFTIM(8),6(R2)          timestamp when GTF written
*
         STCKCONV STCKVAL=GTFTIM,CONVVAL=WORK16,                       X 000042
               TIMETYPE=DEC
         MVC   GTFTIM(16),EDIT_PTN
         ED    GTFTIM(16),WORK16        convert to character and edit
         MVC   JOBNAME,20(R2)           job in control for SMSG
         MVC   SBCH,50(R2)              subchannel used for SMSG
*
         LA    R2,MCBOFFSET(R2)
*
         MVC   MCBHDR,0(R2)
         MVC   CMDCD,16(R2)
         MVC   SID,18(R2)               structure id in vector

CFCOM03.text:
ST    R10,RCNT
         CONTROL DISPLAY,SAVEST
         B     DISPPAN
DISPRM   DC    A(DISPLAY)
         DC    A(DMPANEL+X'80000000')
DISPPAN  LA    R1,DISPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15                  save RC
         ST    R15,RC
*
         VCOPY ZCMD,40,,MOVE,LABEL=ZCMDLEN
         VCOPY ZVERB,8,,MOVE            get the value for ZVERB
*
         L     R15,RC                   restore RC from DISPLAY
         CH    R15,=H'8'                pf12 or pf3 pressed
         BE    FINISH                   ZVERB will check which PFKEY
CHKDONE  EQU   *
         L     R4,ZCMDLEN
         C     R4,=F'0'                 command entered?
         BE    REDISP                    no so redisplay panel
         B     RC4                       yes so set rc4

CFCOM04.text:
B     DISPPAN
*
FINISH   CONTROL DISPLAY,RESTORE
*
         CLC   ZVERB,CANCEL             user hit PF12
         BE    RC4
         CLI   ZVERB,C'E'               user hit PF03 (END or EXIT)
         BE    RC8
RC4      LA    R15,4                    tell main to get another rec
         ST    R15,SAVER15
         B     RTNCMD
RC8      LA    R15,8                    tell main to quit everything
         ST    R15,SAVER15
RTNCMD   EQU   *
         VDELETE (RESP,MCBHDR,CMDCD,SID,RCNT,GTFTIM,SMSGTM)
         VDELETE (RESPDESC,JOBNAME,SBCH)
ALLDONE  EQU   *
         L     R4,ZCMDLEN
         C     R4,=F'0'                 no command entered?
         BE    NOCMD
         LA    R3,ZCMD
         B     GOBACK
NOCMD    SR    R3,R3                    R3 = 0 means no command
GOBACK   L     R13,SAVE+4
         L     R1,SAVER1                restore address of parmlist
         ST    R3,4(,R1)                address of zcmd
         ST    R4,8(,R1)                length of zcmd
         L     R14,12(0,R13)            restore r14,r0, and r2-12
         L     R15,SAVER15
         L     R0,20(0,R13)             R15 is RC
         LM    R2,R12,28(R13)           R1  is return parmlist
         BR    R14                      goback
*
         DS    0D
SAVE     DC    18F'0'
SAVER1   DC    F'0'
SAVER15  DC    F'0'
RC       DC    F'0'
WORK16   DS    CL16
EDIT_PTN  DC   X'4020217A20207A20207A202020202020'    HH:MM:SS:thmiuj
VARS_DEFND DC  C'N'
SMFSAVE  DS    F
ZCMD     DS    CL40
ZVERB    DS    CL8
WORK4    DS    CL8                      translation work area
HEXTAB   DC    C'0123456789ABCDEF'
         COPY DMFUNCT
         LTORG

CMACCP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    CMACCP   &CNVID,&RETCODE
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* LU6.2 CPI-C   ACCEPT A CONVERSATION WITH PARTNER PROGRAM
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
         AIF   ('&CNVID' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&RETCODE' EQ '').ERR3
         LA    R1,&CNVID
         ST    R1,PLIST
         LA    R1,&RETCODE
         ST    R1,PLIST+4
         OI    PLIST+4,X'80'
         LA    R1,PLIST
         L     R15,=V(CMACCP)
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'CONVERSATION ID IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR3    MNOTE 12,'RETURN CODE IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

CMECS.text:
MACRO
&NAME    CMECS    &CNVID,&CNVSTATE,&RETCODE
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* LU6.2 CPI-C   EXTRACT CONVERSATION STATE
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
         AIF   ('&CNVID' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&CNVSTATE' EQ '').ERR2
         AIF   ('&RETCODE' EQ '').ERR3
         LA    R1,&CNVID
         ST    R1,PLIST
         LA    R1,&CNVSTATE
         ST    R1,PLIST+4
         LA    R1,&RETCODE
         ST    R1,PLIST+8
         OI    PLIST+8,X'80'
         LA    R1,PLIST
         L     R15,=V(CMECS)
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'CONVERSATION ID IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR2    MNOTE 12,'CONVERSATION STATE IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR3    MNOTE 12,'RETURN CODE IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

CMINIT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    CMINIT   &CNVID,&SYMNAME,&RETCODE
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* LU6.2 CPI-C   INITIALIZE CONVERSATION
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
         AIF   ('&CNVID' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&SYMNAME' EQ '').ERR2
         AIF   ('&RETCODE' EQ '').ERR3
         LA    R1,&CNVID
         ST    R1,PLIST
         LA    R1,&SYMNAME
         ST    R1,PLIST+4
         LA    R1,&RETCODE
         ST    R1,PLIST+8
         OI    PLIST+8,X'80'
         LA    R1,PLIST
         L     R15,=V(CMINIT)
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'CONVERSATION ID IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR2    MNOTE 12,'SYMBOLIC DEST NAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR3    MNOTE 12,'RETURN CODE IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

CONTROL.text:
MACRO
&NAME    CONTROL &OPRND1,&OPRND2,&OPRND3
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: CONTROL       DEFINES PROCESSING OPTIONS
.*   FORMAT:   CONTROL    OPERAND1,OPERAND2,OPERAND3
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  OPERAND1 - PROCESS TO DEFINE.
.* (OPTIONAL)  OPERAND2 - PARM OF OPERAND 1.
.* (OPTIONAL)  OPERAND3 - PARM OF OPERAND 1.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &CONPRM
&BRANCH  SETC  'CON'.'&SYSNDX'
&CONPRM  SETC  'CONP'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&OPRND1' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         B     &BRANCH
&CONPRM  DC    A(CONTROL)
         AIF   ('&OPRND3' EQ '').OP2
         DC    A(&OPRND1)
         DC    A(&OPRND2)
         DC    A(&OPRND3+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.OP2     AIF   ('&OPRND2' EQ '').OP1
         DC    A(&OPRND1)
         DC    A(&OPRND2+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.OP1     DC    A(&OPRND1+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&CONPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     IHBERMAC 24
         MEXIT
         MEND

GRECLEN.text:
*  Header record with num of entries, lengths, and offsets
         SR    LENGTH,LENGTH           clear even numbered reg for div
         DR    LENGTH,ENTRIES          Divide total length by #ents
         LR    R2,R8                   Move address of buffer to r2
         AR    R2,OFFSET               R2 = start of data for this ent
*

HEADRTN.text:
USING QUAHDR,R8               Different mapping macro
         L     ENTRIES,QUAH#REC        Number of entries in buffer
         L     LENGTH_1,QUAHTLEN       Total length of data + header
         L     OFFSET,QUAHSGOF         Offset to data
         SR    LENGTH_1,OFFSET         Total length of data - header

HEX.text:
MACRO
&NFS     HEX   &TO,&FROM,&L,&LEN=,&HEXTAB=,&BYTE=C' ',&DIGITS=
         GBLC  &HEXTAB#
         LCLA  &LT                      UNPK "TO" LENGTH
         LCLA  &LF                      UNPK "FROM" LENGTH
         LCLA  &LTR                     TR "TO" LENGTH
         LCLA  &LL                      &LEN ONE WAY OR ANOTHER
         LCLC  &F1,&F2,&T1,&T2,&LX
&F1      SETC  '&FROM(1)'               FOR SHORTER STRING LATER
&F2      SETC  '&FROM(2)'               FOR SHORTER STRING LATER
&T1      SETC  '&TO(1)'                 FOR SHORTER STRING LATER
&T2      SETC  '&TO(2)'                 FOR SHORTER STRING LATER
&LX      SETC  '&L&LEN'                 GET LENGTH USING EITHER METHOD
         AIF   ('&LX' EQ '').DEFLEN     LENGTH WILL DEFAULT TO 4
&LL      SETA  &LX                      GET IT
         AGO   .OKLEN
.DEFLEN  ANOP
&LL      SETA  4                        SET THE DEFAULT LENGTH
.OKLEN   AIF   ('&HEXTAB' EQ '').OKHEX1
&HEXTAB# SETC  '&HEXTAB'
.OKHEX1  AIF   ('&HEXTAB#' NE '').OKHEX2
&HEXTAB# SETC  'HEXTAB'
.OKHEX2  ANOP
&LT      SETA  &LL*2
         AIF   ('&DIGITS' EQ '').OKDIGIT
&LT      SETA  &DIGITS
.OKDIGIT AIF   (N'&TO NE 2).TO1
         AIF   (N'&FROM NE 2).T2F1
&NFS     UNPK  &T1.(&LT+1,&T2),&F1.(&LL+1,&F2)
         TR    &T1.(&LT,&T2),&HEXTAB#
         MVI   &T1+&LT.(&T2),&BYTE
         AGO   .DONE
.T2F1    AIF   (N'&FROM NE 1).ERRF
&NFS     UNPK  &T1.(&LT+1,&T2),&FROM.(&LL+1)
         TR    &T1.(&LT,&T2),&HEXTAB#
         MVI   &T1+&LT.(&T2),&BYTE
         AGO   .DONE
.TO1     AIF   (N'&TO NE 1).ERRT
         AIF   (N'&FROM NE 2).T1F1
&NFS     UNPK  &TO.(&LT+1),&F1.(&LL+1,&F2)
         TR    &TO.(&LT),&HEXTAB#
         MVI   &TO+&LT,&BYTE
         AGO   .DONE
.T1F1    AIF   (N'&FROM NE 1).ERRF
&NFS     UNPK  &TO.(&LT+1),&FROM.(&LL+1)
         TR    &TO.(&LT),&HEXTAB#
         MVI   &TO+&LT,&BYTE
         AGO   .DONE
.ERRF    MNOTE 8,'ERROR IN "FROM" PARAMETER, MACRO TERMINATED'
         MEXIT
.ERRT    MNOTE 8,'ERROR IN "TO" PARAMETER, MACRO TERMINATED'
         MEXIT
.DONE    ANOP
         MEND

SAVEISP  DC    F'0'                  ADDRESS OF ISPLINK

REMPOP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    REMPOP &OPTION
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: REMPOP   STOP  POPUP WINDOW MODE
.*
.* (OPTIONAL)  OPTION   - ALL    WILL REMOVE ALL POPUP WINDOWS
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &REMV
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &REMPPRM
&BRANCH  SETC  'RMP'.'&SYSNDX'
&REMPPRM SETC  'REMP'.'&SYSNDX'
&REMV    SETC  'A(REMPOP+X''80000000'')'
         AIF   ('&OPTION' EQ '').DONE
&REMV    SETC  'A(REMPOP)'
.DONE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         CNOP  0,4
&REMPPRM DC    &REMV
         DC    A(&OPTION+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&REMPPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
         MEND

SELECT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SELECT   &OP1,&OP2,&OP3,&OP4,&OP5,&OP6,&OP7,&OP8
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: SELECT
.*   FORMAT:   SELECT PANEL(XXX)
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  AT LEAST ONE PARM. (MAX OF EIGHT).
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &NUMOPS                 NUMBER OF PARMS SUPPLIED
         LCLA  &C                      LOOP COUNTER
         LCLA  &LENGTH                 LENGTH REQUIRED FOR BUFFER
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &SELPRM
         LCLC  &BUFFER
         LCLC  &LBUFFER
         LCLC  &LBUFLEN
&C       SETA  1
&NUMOPS  SETA  N'&SYSLIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'SEL'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
&SELPRM  SETC  'SELP'.'&SYSNDX'       VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
&LBUFFER SETC  'BUFR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BUFFER
&LBUFLEN SETC  'BUFL'.'&SYSNDX'       VARIABLE NAME FOR BUFFER
&BUFFER  SETC  '&SYSLIST(1)'          FIRST STRING IN BUFFER
&LENGTH  SETA  K'&SYSLIST(1)+1        LENGTH OF FIRST STR IN BUFFER
&C       SETA  &C+1
.*
.LOOP    AIF   ('&C' GT '&NUMOPS').FINIS
&LENGTH  SETA  &LENGTH+K'&SYSLIST(&C)+1    ADD 1 FOR SPACE
&BUFFER  SETC  '&BUFFER &SYSLIST(&C)'    CONCATENATE STRINGS
&C       SETA  &C+1
         AGO   .LOOP
.FINIS   ANOP
&LENGTH  SETA  &LENGTH-1              DECREMENT ONE FOR LAST PARM
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         B     &BRANCH
&LBUFLEN DC    F'&LENGTH'             LENGTH OF VARIABLE
&LBUFFER DC    C'&BUFFER'
         CNOP  0,4
&SELPRM  DC    A(SELECT)
         DC    A(&LBUFLEN)
         DC    A(&LBUFFER+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&SELPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
         MEND

SETMSG.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SETMSG   &MSGID
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: SETMSG       DISPLAY MSG ON NEXT PANEL
.*   FORMAT:   SETMSG MSGID
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  MSGID    - ID OF A MESSAGE IN THE ISPMLIB CONCATN.
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &SETMPRM                BRANCH LABEL
         LCLC  &BRANCH                 BRANCH LABEL
         LCLC  &MSGLAB
&SETMPRM SETC  'STM'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&MSGLAB  SETC  'MSG'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR MSGID
&BRANCH  SETC  'MSGB'.'&SYSNDX'       VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
.*
         AIF   ('&MSGID' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         AIF   ('&MSGID' NE 'ZERRMSG').SET1
         MVC   &MSGLAB,ZERRMSG
.SET1    B     &BRANCH
&MSGLAB  DC    CL8'&MSGID'             LENGTH OF VARIABLE
         CNOP  0,4
&SETMPRM DC    A(SETMSG)
         DC    A(&MSGLAB+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&SETMPRM
         AIF   (D'SAVEISP).DEFINED
         L     R15,=V(SAVEISP)         ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
         AGO   .CALL
.DEFINED ANOP
         L     R15,SAVEISP             ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
.CALL    ANOP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'MESSAGEID IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEND

TBADD.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBADD &TBNAM,&EXTVARS,&ORDER
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBADD         ADD A ROW TO TABLE
.*   FORMAT:   TBADD      TABLENAME,NAMES,ORDER
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  NAMES    - LIST OF EXTENSION VARIABLES TO BE SAVED IN
.*                        ADDITION TO TABLE VARIABLES
.* (OPTIONAL)  ORDER    - NEW ROW TO BE ADDED TO THE TABLE IN ORDER
.*                        SPECIFIED IN SORT INFO RECORD. A TBSORT MUST
.*                        HAVE BEEN PERFORMED PRIOR TO USING THIS
.*                        KEYWORD
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &TBEXLST
         LCLC  &TBADPRM
         LCLC  &BRANCH
&TBEXLST SETC  'TBEX'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR EXTVARS
&TBADPRM SETC  'TBAP'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBAD'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
         AIF   ('&TBNAM' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         B     &BRANCH
.SKIP1   AIF   ('&EXTVARS' EQ '').SKIP2
&TBEXLST DC    C'&EXTVARS'              LIST OF NON-KEY VARIABLES
.SKIP2   CNOP  0,4
&TBADPRM DC    A(TBADD)
         AIF   ('&ORDER' EQ '').EXT
         DC    A(&TBNAM)
         DC    A(&EXTVARS)
         DC    A(&ORDER+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.EXT     AIF   ('&EXTVARS' EQ '').CCALL
         DC    A(&TBNAM)
         DC    A(&EXTVARS+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CCALL   ANOP
         DC    A(&TBNAM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBADPRM
         AIF   (D'SAVEISP).DEFINED
         L     R15,=V(SAVEISP)         ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
         AGO   .CALL
.DEFINED ANOP
         L     R15,SAVEISP             ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
.CALL    ANOP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBCREATE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBCREATE &TABNM,&KEYLST,&NAMELST,&WRITE,&REPLACE,&LIB,&SHARE
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBCREATE      CREATE A NEW TABLE
.*   FORMAT:   TBCREATE   TABLENAME,KEYS,NAMES,WRITE,REPL,LIB,SHARE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  KEYS     - LIST OF VARIABLES TO BE USED AS KEYS TO
.*                        ACCESS THE TABLE
.* (OPTIONAL)  NAMES    - LIST OF NON-KEY VARIABLES IN EACH ROW OF
.*                        THE TABLE
.* (OPTIONAL)  WRITE    - WRITE SPECIFIES THAT THE TABLE IS PERMANENT
.*                        NOWRITE SPECIFIES THE TABLE IS TEMPORARY
.* (OPTIONAL)  REPL     - REPLACE SPECIFIES THAT AN EXISTING TABLE IS
.*                        TO BE REPLACED IN STORAGE.
.* (OPTIONAL)  LIB      - SPECIFIES AN OPTIONAL INPUT LIBRARY OTHER
.*                        THAN ISPTLIB
.* (OPTIONAL)  SHARE    - SPECIFIES THE CREATED TABLE CAN BE SHARED
.*                        BETWEEN ALL LOGICAL SCREENS DURING SPLTSCRN
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &TBKYLST
         LCLC  &TBNMLST
         LCLC  &TBLIB
         LCLC  &TBCRPRM
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &KEYL
         LCLC  &NAMEL
         LCLC  &WRITEV
         LCLC  &REPLV
         LCLC  &LIBV
&TBCRPRM SETC  'TBCR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBCB'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
&KEYL    SETC  'A(0)'
&NAMEL   SETC  'A(0)'
&WRITEV  SETC  'A(0)'
&REPLV   SETC  'A(0)'
&LIBV    SETC  'A(0)'
&TBKYLST SETC  'TBKY'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR KEYLST
&TBNMLST SETC  'TBNK'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELST
&TBLIB   SETC  'TBLB'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR LIBRARY
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&TABNM   DC    CL8'&TABNM'              TABLE NAME
         AIF   ('&KEYLST' EQ '').NAMEL
&KEYL    SETC  'A(&TBKYLST)'
&TBKYLST DC    C'&KEYLST'               LIST OF KEY VARIABLES
.NAMEL   AIF   ('&NAMELST' EQ '').LIBA
&NAMEL   SETC  'A(&TBNMLST)'
&TBNMLST DC    C'&NAMELST'              LIST OF NON-KEY VARIABLES
.LIBA    AIF   ('&LIB' EQ '').WRITEA
&LIBV    SETC  'A(&TBLIB)'
&TBLIB   DC    CL8'&LIB'                LIBRARY OTHER THAN ISPTLIB
.WRITEA  AIF   ('&WRITE' EQ '').REPL
&WRITEV  SETC  'A(&WRITE)'
.REPL    AIF   ('&WRITE' EQ '').DONE
&REPLV   SETC  'A(&REPLACE)'
.DONE    CNOP  0,4
&TBCRPRM DC    A(TBCREATE)
         DC    A(&TABNM)
.SHARE   AIF   ('&SHARE' EQ '').LIB
         DC    &KEYL
         DC    &NAMEL
         DC    &WRITEV
         DC    &REPLV
         DC    &LIBV
         DC    A(&SHARE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.LIB     AIF   ('&LIB' EQ '').REPLACE
         DC    &KEYL
         DC    &NAMEL
         DC    &WRITEV
         DC    &REPLV
         DC    A(&TBLIB+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.REPLACE AIF   ('&REPLACE' EQ '').WRITE
         DC    &KEYL
         DC    &NAMEL
         DC    &WRITEV
         DC    A(&REPLACE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.WRITE   AIF   ('&WRITE' EQ '').NAMELST
         DC    &KEYL
         DC    &NAMEL
         DC    A(&WRITE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NAMELST AIF   ('&NAMELST' EQ '').KEYLST
         DC    &KEYL
         DC    A(&TBNMLST+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.KEYLST  AIF   ('&KEYLST' EQ '').FINIS
         DC    A(&TBKYLST+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBCRPRM
         AIF   (D'SAVEISP).DEFINED
         L     R15,=V(SAVEISP)         ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
         AGO   .CALL
.DEFINED ANOP
         L     R15,SAVEISP             ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
.CALL    ANOP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBDELETE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBDELETE &TBNAM
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBDELETE   DELETE A ROW TO TABLE
.*   FORMAT:   TBDELETE   TABLENAME
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &TBEXLST
         LCLC  &TBADPRM
         LCLC  &BRANCH
&TBEXLST SETC  'TBEX'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR EXTVARS
&TBADPRM SETC  'TBAP'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBAD'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
         AIF   ('&TBNAM' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         B     &BRANCH
&TBADPRM DC    A(TBDELETE)
         DC    A(&TBNAM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBADPRM
         AIF   (D'SAVEISP).DEFINED
         L     R15,=V(SAVEISP)         ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
         AGO   .CALL
.DEFINED ANOP
         L     R15,SAVEISP             ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
.CALL    ANOP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBDISPL.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBDISPL &TABNM,&PANEL,&MESSAGE,&FIELD,&TBROWNM,&CUR,&AUTOSEL, X
               &CRPNAM,&ROWID
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBDISPL       DISPLAY TABLE INFORMATION
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  PANEL    - NAME OF PANEL TO BE DISPLAYED
.* (OPTIONAL)  MESSAGEID- ID OF MESSAGE TO DISPLAY ON PANEL
.* (OPTIONAL)  FIELD    - NAME OF FIELD WHERE CURSOR IS TO BE PLACED
.* (OPTIONAL)  TBROWNM  - TABLE ROW NUMBER WHERE CURSOR IS TO BE PLACED
.* (OPTIONAL)  CUR      - CURSOR POSITION WITHIN A FIELD
.* (OPTIONAL)  AUTOSEL  - SEE MANUAL
.* (OPTIONAL)  CRPNAM   - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH ROW NUM IS STORED
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROWID    - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH A NUMBER THAT
.*                        UNIQUELY IDENTIFIES  THE ROW BEING ACCESSED
.*                        IS TO BE STORED.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &PANV
         LCLC  &MSGV
         LCLC  &FLDV
         LCLC  &ROWNV
         LCLC  &CURV
         LCLC  &AUTOV
         LCLC  &CRPV
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBDSPRM
         LCLC  &PNL
&PANV    SETC  'A(0)'
&MSGV    SETC  'A(0)'
&FLDV    SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWNV   SETC  'A(0)'
&CURV    SETC  'A(0)'
&AUTOV   SETC  'A(0)'
&CRPV    SETC  'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBDS'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBDSPRM SETC  'TBDP'.'&SYSNDX'
&PNL     SETC  'TDSP'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&PANEL' EQ '').MSGL
&PANV    SETC  'A(&PNL)'
.MSGL    AIF   ('&MESSAGE' EQ '').FLDL
&MSGV    SETC  'A(&MESSAGE)'
.FLDL    AIF   ('&FIELD' EQ '').ROWNL
&FLDV    SETC  'A(&FIELD)'
.ROWNL   AIF   ('&TBROWNM' EQ '').CURL
&ROWNV   SETC  'A(&TBROWNM)'
.CURL    AIF   ('&CUR' EQ '').AUTOL
&CURV    SETC  'A(&CUR)'
.AUTOL   AIF   ('&AUTOSEL' EQ '').CRPL
&AUTOV   SETC  'A(&AUTOSEL)'
.CRPL    AIF   ('&CRPNAM' EQ '').DONE
&CRPV    SETC  'A(&CRPNAM)'
.DONE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         AIF   ('&PANEL' EQ '').NOPAN
&PNL     DC    CL8'&PANEL'
.NOPAN   CNOP  0,4
&TBDSPRM DC    A(TBDISPL)
.ROWID   AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').CRP
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    &CURV
         DC    &AUTOV
         DC    &CRPV
         DC    A(&ROWID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CRP     AIF   ('&CRPNAM' EQ '').AUTOSEL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    &CURV
         DC    &AUTOV
         DC    A(&CRPNAM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.AUTOSEL AIF   ('&AUTOSEL' EQ '').CUR
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    &CURV
         DC    A(&AUTOSEL+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CUR     AIF   ('&CUR' EQ '').TBROW
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    A(&CUR+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.TBROW   AIF   ('&TBROWNM' EQ '').FIELD
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    A(&TBROWNM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.FIELD   AIF   ('&FIELD' EQ '').MSG
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    A(&FIELD+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.MSG     AIF   ('&MESSAGE' EQ '').PNL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &PANV
         DC    A(&MESSAGE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.PNL     AIF   ('&PANEL' EQ '').CCALL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PNL+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CCALL   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBDSPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBDISPLV.text:
MACRO
&NAME   TBDISPLV &TABNM,&PANEL,&MESSAGE,&FIELD,&TBROWNM,&CUR,&AUTOSEL, X
               &CRPNAM,&ROWID
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBDISPL       DISPLAY TABLE INFORMATION
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  PANEL    - NAME OF PANEL TO BE DISPLAYED
.* (OPTIONAL)  MESSAGEID- ID OF MESSAGE TO DISPLAY ON PANEL
.* (OPTIONAL)  FIELD    - NAME OF FIELD WHERE CURSOR IS TO BE PLACED
.* (OPTIONAL)  TBROWNM  - TABLE ROW NUMBER WHERE CURSOR IS TO BE PLACED
.* (OPTIONAL)  CUR      - CURSOR POSITION WITHIN A FIELD
.* (OPTIONAL)  AUTOSEL  - SEE MANUAL
.* (OPTIONAL)  CRPNAM   - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH ROW NUM IS STORED
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROWID    - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH A NUMBER THAT
.*                        UNIQUELY IDENTIFIES  THE ROW BEING ACCESSED
.*                        IS TO BE STORED.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &PANV
         LCLC  &MSGV
         LCLC  &FLDV
         LCLC  &ROWNV
         LCLC  &CURV
         LCLC  &AUTOV
         LCLC  &CRPV
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBDSPRM
         LCLC  &PNL
&PANV    SETC  'A(0)'
&MSGV    SETC  'A(0)'
&FLDV    SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWNV   SETC  'A(0)'
&CURV    SETC  'A(0)'
&AUTOV   SETC  'A(0)'
&CRPV    SETC  'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBDS'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBDSPRM SETC  'TBDP'.'&SYSNDX'
&PNL     SETC  'TDSP'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&PANEL' EQ '').MSGL
&PANV    SETC  'A(&PNL)'
.MSGL    AIF   ('&MESSAGE' EQ '').FLDL
&MSGV    SETC  'A(&MESSAGE)'
.FLDL    AIF   ('&FIELD' EQ '').ROWNL
&FLDV    SETC  'A(&FIELD)'
.ROWNL   AIF   ('&TBROWNM' EQ '').CURL
&ROWNV   SETC  'A(&TBROWNM)'
.CURL    AIF   ('&CUR' EQ '').AUTOL
&CURV    SETC  'A(&CUR)'
.AUTOL   AIF   ('&AUTOSEL' EQ '').CRPL
&AUTOV   SETC  'A(&AUTOSEL)'
.CRPL    AIF   ('&CRPNAM' EQ '').DONE
&CRPV    SETC  'A(&CRPNAM)'
.DONE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         AIF   ('&PANEL' EQ '').NOPAN
&PNL     DC    CL8'&PANEL'
.NOPAN   CNOP  0,4
&TBDSPRM DC    A(TBDISPL)
.ROWID   AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').CRP
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    &CURV
         DC    &AUTOV
         DC    &CRPV
         DC    A(&ROWID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CRP     AIF   ('&CRPNAM' EQ '').AUTOSEL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    &CURV
         DC    &AUTOV
         DC    A(&CRPNAM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.AUTOSEL AIF   ('&AUTOSEL' EQ '').CUR
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    &CURV
         DC    A(&AUTOSEL+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CUR     AIF   ('&CUR' EQ '').TBROW
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    &ROWNV
         DC    A(&CUR+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.TBROW   AIF   ('&TBROWNM' EQ '').FIELD
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    &FLDV
         DC    A(&TBROWNM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.FIELD   AIF   ('&FIELD' EQ '').MSG
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    &MSGV
         DC    A(&FIELD+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.MSG     AIF   ('&MESSAGE' EQ '').PNL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL)
         DC    A(&MESSAGE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.PNL     AIF   ('&PANEL' EQ '').CCALL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&PANEL+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CCALL   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBDSPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBEND.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBEND &TBNAM
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBEND       CLOSE A TABLE WITHOUT SAVING
.*   FORMAT:   TBEND      TABLENAME
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE ACTED UPON.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   ('&TBNAM' EQ '').ERR
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBENDPRM
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBE'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
&TBENDPRM SETC 'TBEP'.'&SYSNDX'       VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
         B     &BRANCH
         CNOP  0,4
&TBENDPRM EQU  *
         DC    A(TBEND)
         DC    A(&TBNAM+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBENDPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBGET.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBGET &TABNM,&SVENAM,&ROWID,&NOREAD,&POSITION
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBGET    ACCESS A ROW IN THE TABLE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  SVENAME  - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH EXT VARS ARE SAVED
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROWID    - NAME OF VAR IN WHICH THE NUMBER OF ROW BEING
.*                        ACCESSED IS TO BE STORED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  NOREAD   - DON'T READ VARIABLES IN ROW TO VARIABLE POOL
.* (OPTIONAL)  POSITION - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH THE ROW NUMBER
.*                        POINTED TO BY THE CRP IS TO BE STORED.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &SVEV
         LCLC  &ROWV
         LCLC  &NORV
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBGTPRM
&SVEV    SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWV    SETC  'A(0)'
&NORV    SETC  'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBGT'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBGTPRM SETC  'TBGP'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&SVENAM' EQ '').ROWL
&SVEV    SETC  'A(&SVENAM)'
.ROWL    AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').NORL
&ROWV    SETC  'A(&ROWID)'
.NORL    AIF   ('&NOREAD' EQ '').DONE
&NORV    SETC  'A(&NOREAD)'
.DONE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         CNOP  0,4
&TBGTPRM DC    A(TBGET)
         AIF   ('&POSITION' EQ '').NORD
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    &NORV
         DC    A(&POSITION+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NORD    AIF   ('&NOREAD' EQ '').ROWID
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    A(&NOREAD+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROWID   AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').SVENAM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    A(&ROWID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.SVENAM  AIF   ('&SVENAM' EQ '').CCALL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&SVENAM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CCALL   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBGTPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBPUT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBPUT &TABNM,&SVENAM,&ORDER
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBPUT    CONDITIONAL UPDATE OF A ROW
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE UPDATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  SVENAME  - LIST OF EXTENSION VARS TO BE SAVED IN ROW
.* (OPTIONAL)  ORDER    - UPDATED ROW TO BE PLACED AT POINT THAT
.*                        PRESERVES INFO IN THE SORT INFO RECORD.
.*                        A TBSORT MUST HAVE BEEN PERFORMED FOR THIS
.*                        TABLE PRIOR TO THE USE OF THIS KEYWORD.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &SVEV
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBPTPRM
&SVEV    SETC  'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBPT'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBPTPRM SETC  'TBPP'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&SVENAM' EQ '').DONE
&SVEV    SETC  'A(&SVENAM)'
.DONE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         CNOP  0,4
&TBPTPRM DC    A(TBPUT)
         AIF   ('&ORDER' EQ '').SVENAM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    A(&ORDER+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.SVENAM  AIF   ('&SVENAM' EQ '').CCALL
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&SVENAM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.CCALL   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBPTPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBQUERY.text:
MACRO
&NAME TBQUERY &TABNM,&KEYS=,&NAMES=,&ROWNUM=,&KEYNUM=,&NAMENUM=,&POS=
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBSKPRM
         LCLC  &KEYSV
         LCLC  &NAMESV
         LCLC  &ROWNUMV
         LCLC  &KEYNUMV
         LCLC  &NAMENUMV
&KEYSV  SETC  'A(0)'
&NAMESV  SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWNUMV SETC  'A(0)'
&KEYNUMV SETC  'A(0)'
&NAMENUMV SETC 'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBQU'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBSKPRM SETC  'TBQE'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         AIF   ('&KEYS' EQ '').SAVEL
&KEYSV  SETC  'A(&KEYS)'
.SAVEL   AIF   ('&NAMES' EQ '').ROWNUML
&NAMESV  SETC  'A(&NAMES)'
.ROWNUML AIF   ('&ROWNUM' EQ '').KEYNUML
&ROWNUMV SETC  'A(&ROWNUM)'
.KEYNUML AIF   ('&KEYNUM' EQ '').NAMENUML
&KEYNUMV SETC  'A(&KEYNUM)'
.NAMENUML AIF  ('&NAMENUM' EQ '').DONE
&NAMENUMV SETC 'A(&NAMENUM)'
.DONE    CNOP  0,4
&TBSKPRM DC    A(TBQUERY)
         AIF   ('&POS' EQ '').NAMENUM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &KEYSV
         DC    &NAMESV
         DC    &ROWNUMV
         DC    &KEYNUMV
         DC    &NAMENUMV
         DC    A(&POS+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NAMENUM AIF   ('&NAMENUM' EQ '').KEYNUM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &KEYSV
         DC    &NAMESV
         DC    &ROWNUMV
         DC    &KEYNUMV
         DC    A(&NAMENUM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.KEYNUM  AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').ROWNUM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &KEYSV
         DC    &NAMESV
         DC    &ROWNUMV
         DC    A(&KEYNUM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROWNUM  AIF   ('&ROWNUM' EQ '').NAMES
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &KEYSV
         DC    &NAMESV
         DC    A(&ROWNUM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NAMES   AIF   ('&NAMES' EQ '').NUM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    &KEYSV
         DC    A(&NAMES+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NUM     AIF   ('&KEYS' EQ '').TABNM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&KEYS+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.TABNM   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBSKPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBSKIP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBSKIP &TABNM,&NUM=,&SVE=,&ROWID=,&ROW=,&READ=,&POS=
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBSKIP   MOVE CRP FORWARD/BACKWARD & RTRVE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  NUMBER   - DIRECTION AND NUMBER OF ROWS TO MOVE + OR -
.* (OPTIONAL)  SVENAME  - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH EXT VARS ARE SAVED
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROWID    - NAME OF VAR IN WHICH THE NUMBER OF ROW BEING
.*                        ACCESSED IS TO BE STORED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROW      - NUMERIC VALUE THAT IDENTIFIES ROW TO BE ACCSD
.* (OPTIONAL)  NOREAD   - DON'T READ VARIABLES IN ROW TO VARIABLE POOL
.* (OPTIONAL)  POSITION - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH THE ROW NUMBER
.*                        POINTED TO BY THE CRP IS TO BE STORED.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBSKPRM
         LCLC  &TBSKROW
         LCLC  &NUMV
         LCLC  &SVEV
         LCLC  &ROWIDV
         LCLC  &ROWV
         LCLC  &READV
         LCLC  &TSKNUM
         LCLC  &PACK
&NUMV    SETC  'A(0)'
&SVEV    SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWIDV  SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWV    SETC  'A(0)'
&CRPV    SETC  'F(0)'
&READV   SETC  'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBSK'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBSKPRM SETC  'TBKI'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBSKROW SETC  'TBKR'.'&SYSNDX'
&TSKNUM  SETC  'NUM'.'&SYSNDX'
&PACK    SETC  'PAK'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&NUM' EQ '').NONUM
         PACK  &PACK+4(4),&NUM.(6)
         CVB   R1,&PACK
         ST    R1,&TSKNUM
.NONUM   AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').NOROW
         MVC   &TBSKROW,&ROW+2
         OI    &TBSKROW,X'80'
.NOROW   CNOP  0,4
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&PACK    DS    D
&TSKNUM  DC    F'0'
.SAVEL   AIF   ('&SVE' EQ '').ROWIDL
&SVEV    SETC  'A(&SVE)'
.ROWIDL  AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').ROWL
&ROWIDV  SETC  'A(&ROWID)'
.ROWL    AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').READL
&ROWV    SETC  'A(&ROW)'
.READL   AIF   ('&READ' EQ '').DONE
&READV   SETC  'A(&READ)'
.DONE    CNOP  0,4
&TBSKPRM DC    A(TBSKIP)
         AIF   ('&POS' EQ '').READ
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&TSKNUM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWIDV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    &READV
         DC    A(&POS+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.READ    AIF   ('&READ' EQ '').ROW
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&TSKNUM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWIDV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    A(&READ+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROW     AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').ROWID
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&TSKNUM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWIDV
&TBSKROW DC    A(&ROW+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROWID   AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').SVE
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&TSKNUM)
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    A(&ROWID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.SVE     AIF   ('&SVE' EQ '').NUM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&TSKNUM)
         DC    A(&SVE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NUM     AIF   ('&NUM' EQ '').TABNM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
         DC    A(&TSKNUM+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.TABNM   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBSKPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBSKIPSV.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBSKIP &TABNM,&NUM=,&SVE=,&ROWID=,&ROW=,&READ=,&POS=
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBSKIP   MOVE CRP FORWARD/BACKWARD & RTRVE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  NUMBER   - DIRECTION AND NUMBER OF ROWS TO MOVE + OR -
.* (OPTIONAL)  SVENAME  - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH EXT VARS ARE SAVED
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROWID    - NAME OF VAR IN WHICH THE NUMBER OF ROW BEING
.*                        ACCESSED IS TO BE STORED.
.* (OPTIONAL)  ROW      - NUMERIC VALUE THAT IDENTIFIES ROW TO BE ACCSD
.* (OPTIONAL)  NOREAD   - DON'T READ VARIABLES IN ROW TO VARIABLE POOL
.* (OPTIONAL)  POSITION - NAME OF VARIABLE IN WHICH THE ROW NUMBER
.*                        POINTED TO BY THE CRP IS TO BE STORED.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBSKPRM
         LCLC  &TBSKROW
         LCLC  &NUMV
         LCLC  &SVEV
         LCLC  &ROWIDV
         LCLC  &ROWV
         LCLC  &READV
         LCLC  &TSKNUM
&NUMV    SETC  'A(0)'
&SVEV    SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWIDV  SETC  'A(0)'
&ROWV    SETC  'A(0)'
&CRPV    SETC  'F(0)'
&READV   SETC  'A(0)'
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBSK'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBSKPRM SETC  'TBKI'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBSKROW SETC  'TBKR'.'&SYSNDX'
&TSKNUM  SETC  'NUM'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TABNM' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&NUM' EQ '').NONUM
         MVC   &TSKNUM,&NUM+2
         OI    &TSKNUM,X'80'
.NONUM   AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').NOROW
         MVC   &TBSKROW,&ROW+2
         OI    &TBSKROW,X'80'
.NOROW   CNOP  0,4
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
.SAVEL   AIF   ('&SVE' EQ '').ROWIDL
&SVEV    SETC  'A(&SVE)'
.ROWIDL  AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').ROWL
&ROWIDV  SETC  'A(&ROWID)'
.ROWL    AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').READL
&ROWV    SETC  'A(&ROW)'
.READL   AIF   ('&READ' EQ '').DONE
&READV   SETC  'A(&READ)'
.DONE    CNOP  0,4
&TBSKPRM DC    A(TBSKIP)
         AIF   ('&POS' EQ '').READ
         DC    A(&TABNM)
&TSKNUM  DC    X'00000000'
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWIDV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    &READV
         DC    A(&POS+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.READ    AIF   ('&READ' EQ '').ROW
         DC    A(&TABNM)
&TSKNUM  DC    X'00000000'
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWIDV
         DC    &ROWV
         DC    A(&READ+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROW     AIF   ('&ROW' EQ '').ROWID
         DC    A(&TABNM)
&TSKNUM  DC    X'00000000'
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    &ROWIDV
&TBSKROW DC    A(&ROW+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.ROWID   AIF   ('&ROWID' EQ '').SVE
         DC    A(&TABNM)
&TSKNUM  DC    X'00000000'
         DC    &SVEV
         DC    A(&ROWID+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.SVE     AIF   ('&SVE' EQ '').NUM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
&TSKNUM  DC    X'00000000'
         DC    A(&SVE+X'80000000')
         AGO   .FINIS
.NUM     AIF   ('&NUM' EQ '').TABNM
         DC    A(&TABNM)
&TSKNUM  DC    X'80000000'
         AGO   .FINIS
.TABNM   ANOP
         DC    A(&TABNM+X'80000000')
.FINIS   ANOP
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBSKPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBSORT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBSORT &TBNAM,&SRTLIST
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBSORT        ADD A ROW TO TABLE
.*   FORMAT:   TBSORT     TABLENAME,SORTLIST
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE CREATED.
.* (REQUIRED)  SORTLIST - LIST OF SORT FIELDS (NAME, TYPE, ORDER)
.*                        EX (TBNAME,C,A)
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &SRTLBL
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBSRPRM
&SRTLBL SETC   'SORT'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
&TBSRPRM SETC  'TBSRP'.'&SYSNDX'       VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBSR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
         AIF   ('&TBNAM' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&SRTLIST' EQ '').ERR2
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&SRTLBL  DC    C'&SRTLIST'             LIST OF SORT FIELDS
         CNOP  0,4
&TBSRPRM DC    A(TBSORT)
         DC    A(&TBNAM)
         DC    A(&SRTLBL+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&TBSRPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS REQUIRED -- TBSORT TBNAME,(SORTLST)'
         MEXIT
.ERR2    MNOTE 12,'SORTLIST IS REQUIRED -- TBSORT TBNAME,(SORTLST)'
         MEXIT
         MEND

TBTOP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    TBTOP &TBNAM
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: TBTOP         SET CRP TO THE TOP OF A TABLE
.*   FORMAT:   TBTOP      TABLENAME
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  TABLENAME- NAME OF TABLE TO BE ACTED UPON.
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &TBTPPRM
&BRANCH  SETC  'TBTO'.'&SYSNDX'
&TBTPPRM SETC  'TBTP'.'&SYSNDX'
         AIF   ('&TBNAM' EQ '').ERR
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
         CNOP  0,4
&TBTPPRM DC    A(TBTOP)
         DC    A(&TBNAM+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  LA    R1,&TBTPPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'TABLENAME IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

VCOPY.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VCOPY    &NMLST,&LENGTH,&VARLST,&MODE,&DEFINE=,&LABEL=
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VCOPY
.*   FORMAT:   VCOPY  NAMELIST,LENGTH,VARIABLE,MODE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  NAMELIST - LIST OF VARIABLE NAMES TO COPY.
.* (REQUIRED)  LENGTH   - LENGTH OF VARIABLE TO COPY.
.* (OPTIONAL)  VARIABLE - AREA OF STORAGE TO COPY INTO IF DIFFERENT
.*                        FROM THE NAME IN NAMELIST
.* (OPTIONAL)  MODE     - MOVE MODE OR LOCATE MODE (LOCATE IS DFLT)
.* (KEYWORD )  DEFINE   - DEFINE THE VARIABLE (Y OR N)  DEFAULT=N
.* (KEYWORD )  LABEL    - LABEL TO USE FOR LEN OF COPIED VARIABLE
.*  EXAMPLE    VCOPY  (ZTDSELS),4,,MOVE
.*             WILL MOVE A COPY OF VARIABLE ZTDSELS TO PROGRAM
.*             AREA OF NAME ZTDSELS AND LENGTH 4
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &NMLEN                  NMLST  LENGTH
         LCLC  &VCPYLEN
         LCLC  &VCPYPRM
         LCLC  &VARNME
         LCLC  &MODETYP
         LCLC  &BRANCH
         LCLC  &DEFVAR
&VCPYPRM SETC  'VCPR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR LENGTH
&VCPYLEN SETC  'VCLN'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR LENGTH
         AIF   (K'&LABEL EQ 0).NOLBL
&VCPYLEN SETC  '&LABEL'
.NOLBL   ANOP
&VCPYLST SETC  'VCNM'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMLST
&BRANCH  SETC  'VCBR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
&VARNME  SETC  '&VARLST'               INITIALIZE THE VARIABLE NAME
         AIF   ('&NMLST' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&LENGTH' EQ '').ERR2
&DEFVAR  SETC  'YES'
         AIF   (K'&DEFINE GT 0).GOVAR
&DEFVAR  SETC  'NO'                    DEFAULT FOR DEFINE THE VAR
.GOVAR   AIF   ('&VARLST' NE '').MODE  IF VARLST NOT SUPPLIED
&VARNME  SETC  '&NMLST'                THEN SET IT TO NMLST
.MODE    AIF   ('&MODE' EQ 'MOVE').MOVE
&MODETYP SETC  'LOCATE'
         AGO   .CODE
.MOVE    ANOP
&MODETYP SETC  'MOVE'
.*
.CODE    ANOP
&NAME    CNOP  0,4
         MVC   &VCPYLEN,=F'&LENGTH'
         B     &BRANCH
&VCPYLST DC    C'(&NMLST)'
&VCPYLEN DC    F'&LENGTH'               LENGTH OF VARIABLE
         AIF   ('&DEFVAR'(1,1) NE 'Y').NODEF
&NMLST   DS    CL&LENGTH
.NODEF   CNOP  0,4
&VCPYPRM DC    A(VCOPY)
         DC    A(&VCPYLST)
         DC    A(&VCPYLEN)
         DC    A(&VARNME)
         DC    A(&MODETYP+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&VCPYPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST  IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR2    MNOTE 12,'LENGTH IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

VDEFINE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VDEFINE  &NMLST,&FORMAT,&LEN,&OPTLST,&UDATA
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VDEFINE
.*   FORMAT:   VDEFINE NAMELIST,FORMAT,LENGTH,OPTIONS,USERDATA
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  NAMELIST - LIST OF VARIABLE NAMES TO DEFINE.
.*                        MUST BE ENCLOSED IN () AND SEPARATED BY ','
.*                        IF MULTIPLE VARIABLES ARE DEFINED THEY
.*                        MUST ALL BE THE SAME FORMAT AND LENGTH.
.* (REQUIRED)  FORMAT   - VALID FMTS ARE: CHAR, BIT, FIXED, HEX, PACK
.* (REQUIRED)  LENGTH   - LENGTH OF VARIABLE
.* (OPTIONAL)  OPTIONS  - SPECIFIES INITIALZTN OF DEFINED STORAGE
.*                        AND/OR RETENTION OF TRAILING BLANKS IN
.*                        VARIABLE STORAGE
.* (OPTIONAL)  USERDATA - NOT CURRENTLY HANDLED
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &C                      COUNTER FOR ITEMS IN SUBLIST
         LCLA  &MAX                    # OF ITEMS + 1 (LOOP PRCSSNG)
         LCLC  &BRANCH                 BRANCH LABEL
         LCLC  &T                      DS TYPE
         LCLC  &VDEFPRM
         LCLC  &VARNAME
         LCLC  &VDEFFMT
         LCLC  &VDEFLEN
         LCLC  &VDEFLST
&VDEFPRM SETC  'VDF'.'&SYSNDX'         VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&VDEFFMT SETC  'VFM'.'&SYSNDX'         VARIABLE NAME FOR FORMAT
&VDEFLEN SETC  'VDLN'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR LENGTH
&VDEFLST SETC  'VDNM'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'VDBR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH LABEL
.*
&C       SETA  1
&MAX     SETA  N'&SYSLIST(1)+1         # OF ENTRIES IN SUBLIST + 1
         AIF   ('&NMLST' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&FORMAT' EQ '').ERR2
         AIF   ('&LEN' EQ '').ERR3
.TYPEP   AIF   ('&FORMAT'(1,4) NE 'PACK').TYPEC
&T       SETC  'PL&LEN'
         AGO   .CODE
.TYPEC   AIF   ('&FORMAT' NE 'CHAR').TYPEH
&T       SETC  'CL&LEN'
         AGO   .CODE
.TYPEH   AIF   ('&FORMAT' NE 'HEX').TYPEFL
&T       SETC  'XL&LEN'
         AGO   .CODE
.TYPEFL  AIF   ('&FORMAT' NE 'FLOAT').TYPEF
&T       SETC  'XL&LEN'
         AGO   .CODE
.TYPEF   AIF   ('&FORMAT' NE 'FIXED').TYPEB
&T       SETC  'XL&LEN'
         AGO   .CODE
.TYPEB   AIF   ('&FORMAT' NE 'BIT').ERRTYPE
&T       SETC  'BL&LEN'
.CODE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&VDEFLST DC    C'&NMLST'               LIST OF VARIABLES TO DEFINE
&VDEFLEN DC    F'&LEN'                 LENGTH OF VARIABLE
&VDEFFMT DC    CL8'&FORMAT'            FORMATTING TYPE
.DCLOOP  ANOP
&VARNAME SETC  '&NMLST(&C)'            VARIABLE NAME
&VARNAME DS    &T                      VARIABLE STORAGE
&C       SETA  &C+1
         AIF   ('&MAX' GT '&C').DCLOOP
         CNOP  0,4
&VDEFPRM DC    A(VDEFINE)
         DC    A(&VDEFLST)
         DC    A(&NMLST(1))
         DC    A(&VDEFFMT)
         DC    A(&VDEFLEN+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&VDEFPRM             ADDRESS OF PARM LIST
         AIF   (D'SAVEISP).DEFINED
         L     R15,=V(SAVEISP)         ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
         AGO   .CALL
.DEFINED ANOP
         L     R15,SAVEISP             ADDRESS OF ISPLINK
.CALL    ANOP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERRTYPE MNOTE 12,'FORMAT MUST BE ''CHAR HEX BIT OR FIXED'''
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR2    MNOTE 12,'FORMAT IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR3    MNOTE 12,'LENGTH IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

VDELETE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VDELETE  &NMLST
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VDELETE        REMOVE VARIABLE NAMES
.*   FORMAT:   VDELETE NAMELIST
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  NAMELIST - LIST OF VARIABLE NAMES TO DELETE.
.*                        MUST BE ENCLOSED IN () UNLESS * IS CODED.
.*                        IF * IS CODED ALL DIALOG VARIABLES DEFINED
.*                        BY THIS PROGRAM ARE REMOVED.
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &VDELPRM
&VDELPRM SETC  'VDLP'.'&SYSNDX'
         LCLC  &VDELLST
         LCLC  &BRANCH                 BRANCH LABEL
&BRANCH  SETC  'VDLB'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&VDELLST SETC  'VDEL'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
.*
         AIF   ('&NMLST' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   ('&NMLST'(1,1) NE '(').ASTRSK
         AIF   ('&NMLST'(2,1) NE '*').SETNAM
&DNAMLST SETC  '*'
         AGO   .CODE
.ASTRSK  AIF   ('&NMLST'(1,1) NE '*').ERRAST
&DNAMLST SETC  '*'
         AGO   .CODE
.SETNAM  ANOP
&DNAMLST SETC  '&NMLST'
.CODE    ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&VDELLST DC    C'&DNAMLST'             LIST OF VARIABLES TO DEFINE
         CNOP  0,4
&VDELPRM DC    A(VDELETE)
         DC    A(&VDELLST+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&VDELPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERRAST  MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST MUST BE ENCLOSED IN ()'
         MEND

VGET.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VGET     &NMLST,&POOL
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VGET        COPY VAR FROM SHRD OR PROF
.*   FORMAT:   VGET NAMELIST,POOL              TO FUNCTION POOL
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  NAMELIST - LIST OF VARIABLE NAMES TO COPY.
.* (OPTIONAL)  POOL     - ASIS (DEFAULT), SHARED OR PROFILE
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &VGETLST
         LCLC  &VPOOL
         LCLC  &VGETPRM
         LCLC  &BRANCH                 BRANCH LABEL
&BRANCH  SETC  'VGTB'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&VGETLST SETC  'VGET'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&VGETPRM SETC  'VGTP'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&VPOOL   SETC  'ASIS'
.*
         AIF   ('&NMLST' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   (K'&POOL EQ 0).SKPPOOL
&VPOOL   SETC  '&POOL'
.SKPPOOL ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&VGETLST DC    C'&NMLST'             LIST OF VARIABLES TO COPY
         CNOP  0,4
&VGETPRM DC    A(VGET)
         DC    A(&VGETLST)
         DC    A(&VPOOL+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&VGETPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

VPUT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VPUT     &NMLST,&POOL
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VPUT        COPY VAR FROM FUNCTION POOL
.*   FORMAT:   VPUT NAMELIST,POOL              TO SHARED OR PROFILE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  NAMELIST - LIST OF VARIABLE NAMES TO COPY.
.* (OPTIONAL)  POOL     - ASIS (DEFAULT), SHARED OR PROFILE
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &VPUTLST
         LCLC  &VPOOL
         LCLC  &BRANCH                 BRANCH LABEL
         LCLC  &VPUTPRM
&VPUTPRM SETC  'VGTP'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'VGTB'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&VPUTLST SETC  'VPUT'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&VPOOL   SETC  'ASIS'
.*
         AIF   ('&NMLST' EQ '').ERR
         AIF   (K'&POOL EQ 0).SKPPOOL
&VPOOL   SETC  '&POOL'
.SKPPOOL ANOP
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&VPUTLST DC    C'&NMLST'             LIST OF VARIABLES TO COPY
         CNOP  0,4
&VPUTPRM DC    A(VPUT)
         DC    A(&VPUTLST)
         DC    A(&VPOOL+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&VPUTPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR     MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

VREPLACE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VREPLACE &NMLST,&LENGTHS,&VALUES
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VREPLACE
.*   FORMAT:   VREPLACE NAMELIST,LENGTH,VALUE
.*
.* (REQUIRED)  NAMELIST - LIST OF VARIABLE NAMES TO DEFINE.
.*                        MUST BE ENCLOSED IN () AND SEPARATED BY ,
.* (REQUIRED)  LENGTH   - LENGTH OF VARIABLE IN () SEPARATED BY ,
.* (REQUIRED)  VALUES   - DATA IN () SEPARATED BY ,
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &C                      COUNTER FOR ITEMS IN SUBLIST
         LCLA  &MAX                    # OF ITEMS + 1 (LOOP PRCSSNG)
         LCLC  &BRANCH                 BRANCH LABEL
         LCLC  &VREPLEN
         LCLC  &VREPLST
         LCLC  &VREPPRM
&VREPPRM SETC  'VRPM'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
&VREPLEN SETC  'VRLN'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR LENGTH
&VREPLST SETC  'VRNM'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR NAMELIST
&BRANCH  SETC  'VRBR'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR BRANCH
.*
&C       SETA  1
&MAX     SETA  N'&SYSLIST(1)+1         # OF ENTRIES IN SUBLIST + 1
         AIF   ('&NMLST' EQ '').ERR1
         AIF   ('&LENGTHS' EQ '').ERR2
         AIF   ('&VALUES' EQ '').ERR3
&NAME    B     &BRANCH
&VREPLST DC    C'&NMLST'               LIST OF VARIABLES TO DEFINE
&VREPLEN DC    F'&LENGTHS(1)'          LENGTH OF VARIABLE
         AGO   .INC1
.DCLEN   ANOP
         DC    F'&LENGTHS(&C)'         LENGTH OF VARIABLE
.INC1    ANOP
&C       SETA  &C+1
         AIF   ('&MAX' GT '&C').DCLEN
&C       SETA  1
         CNOP  0,4
&VREPPRM DC    A(VREPLACE)
         DC    A(&VREPLST)
         DC    A(&VREPLEN)
         DC    A(&VALUES+X'80000000')
&BRANCH  EQU   *
         LA    R1,&VREPPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
.ERR1    MNOTE 12,'NAMELIST IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR2    MNOTE 12,'LENGTH IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
.ERR3    MNOTE 12,'VALUE  IS A REQUIRED PARM'
         MEXIT
         MEND

VRESET.text:
MACRO
&NAME    VRESET
.*DIALOG MANAGER MACRO -- DIALOG MANAGEMENT SERVICES (SC34-4021)
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.* DIALOG MANAGER SERVICE: VRESET      RESET FUNCTION POOL VARS
.*   FORMAT:   VRESET
.*                        ANY DEFINED VARIABLES ARE REMOVED FROM THE
.*                        FUNCTION POOL (AS THOUGH VDELETES WERE DONE).
.*                        IMPLICIT VARIABLES ARE ALSO DELETED.
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLC  &VRESPRM
&VRESPRM SETC  'VRES'.'&SYSNDX'        VARIABLE NAME FOR PARMLIST
         CNOP  0,4
&NAME    B     *+4
&VRESPRM DC    A(VRESET+X'80000000')
         LA    R1,&VRESPRM
         L     R15,SAVEISP
         BALR  R14,R15
         MEXIT
         MEND
